Review_title: Lone in a Island - lost in time
Review_Text: Ostrov - Lost Island is about the land that God forgot.A lost part of the Soviet Union - and on this island of Ostrov in the Caspian Sea the inhabitants are left alone by the Russian state after the collapse of the Soviet Union, surviving through poaching.They are occasionally visited by Russian military telling them to go somewhere else, and stop fishing, which aren't allowed even if it's what they live by.It's heartfelt, interesting and a profound portrait of the family which gives you the idea of how it is to live and grow up in such a situation.The people have their thoughts about the world.
